item.title: SQL's SELECT DISTINCT ON
item.description:
tldr: SQL madness

I recently did a coding chalenge to build a survey site that analyzes responses at the end. They were interested in a question along the lines of “What was the most popular answer for people of each group?”, where the groups were decided by one of the questions.

Here’s an example, where the groups might be “<18” and “18+”.

1. What's your age?
    A. 0-17     B. 18+
2. What's your favorite season?
    A. Winter   B. Spring   C. Summer   D. Fall
3. What programming language do you like the best?
    A. C        B. Java     C. Python

My DB schema was something like:
